titleStmt.title: The triall of Mr. John Gibbons, in Westminster-Hall, before the High-Court of Justice, beginning July 18. 1651
titleStmt.author: Gibbons, John, d. 1651.

notesStmt.note: Stained with some print show-through; cropped at head.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
